name: Poison Heart
description: Poison Heart is a snowy city / Xmas-themed / hi-tech level that should last you about 50 mins on your first playthrough.

name: Factory Parking
description: A Doom-style map (more abstract and less realistic, among other things) that takes place in some parking lots/garages that have been invaded by the aliens.

name: Fear Of The Dark
description: A new wintery map that takes place in a spoopy space research center filled with spoop, monsters and space-stuff. Also lots of snow.

name: Precipice Pain
description: A Doom-style map that revolves around a big vaguely hellish rock formation, on which Duke has to "climb" (jump, fall off ledges, etc.) up and down a lot.

name: Metal Eye
description:
In Metal Eye, the player takes the role of a young weapons expert named Findhill. His father was apparently involved in a project that dealt with creating artificial life forms. But recently he has disappeared without a trace. Findhill remained alone, in a small town surrounded by vicious monsters. He wants to become a hunter, just like his father once was, to get rid of the monsters roaming the wilderness, and get to the bottom of his father's disappearance and his mysterious project.

The game is a rather traditional Japanese RPG: Findhill and his companions, who join the party as dictated by the course of the story, wander around a vast world map, visiting towns, descending into dungeons, and fighting random enemies in turn-based combat viewed from a first-person perspective. The party can carry different types of weapons, including various guns (rifles, shotguns, etc.) with expendable bullets. Weapons and armor are shared by all the characters and need not be equipped on individual combatants. The player can also purchase robotic fighters (called "Metals" in the game) in shops, who would then join the party and participate in battles, controlled by the AI. There are scenes with nudity and sexual situations in the game.

name: Metal Eye 2
description:
Metal Eye 2 is set in the same sci-fi universe and is closely related story-wise to the first game. In the future, people have built the floating city Zeron, where the best scientists work on creating androids, artificial human beings who look the same way as real ones. Harvest Corporation is the biggest company that creates androids. The hero of the game is a scientist named Wirg, the father of the first game's protagonist. His work is to train the androids after they have been created. One day, the company building is attacked, and Wirg has to escape. He is saved by a nun and brought into a small town in the middle of wasteland, where his adventure begins.

The game mostly follows a traditional Japanese RPG template: Wirg and his companions (a party of three) explore the top-down world and fight random enemies in turn-based combat in first-person view. The pictures of enemies appear super-imposed on whatever location the characters are currently in, without separate battle screens. The towns have isometric perspective. Like its predecessor, the game has a large world map that consists of many separate screens, often including dungeon-like locations.

name: Yami no Koe II
description: Sayoko sends K off the island to a secluded private academy, where she makes an ally of the principal and begins to influence the students and faculty, slowly degenerating the entire school. However, one of the students is a miko who resists K's influence.

name: Flowers: Kokoro no Hana
description: Ryusei Ryousen is a 2nd year high school student. His school has just recently been co-educated from all girls school. There are only three boys in school and a lot of wonderful girls around the hero. Which one will be chosen by the April?

name: Brutalist
description: Brutalist is a third-person meditative game where you need to follow paths, find passages, solve riddles, watch out for radiation and monitor oxygen levels. And all this is surrounded by an atmospheric abandoned concrete world.

name: Jigoku Seek

name: Yo-kai Watch 1 Smartphone
description:
Yo-kai Watch centers on a boy who gets a special watch that lets him befriend and help mischievous Yo-kai and later summon them to fight other Yo-kai. Players can overcome challenges and help various characters solve everyday problems with the help of Yo-kai friends. These eccentric Yo-kai resemble anything from inanimate objects to mythical creatures.

Yo-Kai Watch 1 Smartphone is a port of the original Nintendo 3DS game for Android and iOS.

name: Escape From Bunker
description: A near future in which mankind is threatened by a falling meteorite! And that to save humanity all are placed in bunkers, which are controlled by artificial intelligence! Something went wrong, and even after the danger has passed, the computer still decides that you have to stay locked up here forever...

name: Chillin'
description: This map focuses on an alien spacecraft and some buildings around where it landed; by the time Duke gets there, there are way too many aliens in the area just kinda chillin'.

name: Sikhl
description: Sikhl is set somewhere in the southwestern USA. There's been various reports of EDF troops getting fired upon by unknown assailants near a vast canyon area. Duke's been ordered to travel there and find out what's going on.

name: Nuclear Plant 2024
description: Nuclear Plant 2024 is a map of Doom: E1M2 but Reimagined!

name: Cataclysm
description: A very small map based around the detailing of e2m1 and other episode 2 maps.

name: The Immortal Lock
description:
You are Ranger, an operator of the UTJR stationed at a secret, multinational research facility in Finland. You are being deployed to investigate the disappearance of a survey team that went missing beyond the slipgate, cast into the farthest reaches of existence. Yet through the thin veil of reality, you find only a desolate plane of flesh and despair, and a dread voice that beckons your name.

This map is larger than an entire episode, if played in its entirety, and is best experienced in segments. It includes a story, extremely challenging fights, trick jumping, and a vast amount of large secret areas, but is difficulty scaled to accommodate everyone.

name: 4 of Clubs
description: Sin descripción

description: An expanded version of ExaByt's Quake Brutalist Jam 2 map and now using Alkaline.

name: Missing Coordinates

name: 1024 Cement Mixer
description: A short aggressive map within a 1024 player-bound volume.

name: The Callisto Protocol: Outer Way Skin Collection
description: Get the Outer Way Skin Collection and survive The Callisto Protocol’s terrifying campaign in style or show off your player and weapon skins in Photo Mode. This collection includes Outer Way themed player and weapons skins for all your gear.

name: Planet Zoo: Barnyard Animal Pack
description:
Experience the rustic charm of the countryside in Planet Zoo: Barnyard Animal Pack! Bring rural beauty to your zoos and let your guests encounter seven beloved animals that have lived alongside humans for hundreds of years.

Welcome these social species, the stunning Highland cattle with its heavy rich coat and imposing horns, the Sussex chicken with its playful and curious nature, the Alpine goat, renowned for their agility and sure-footedness, and the alpaca, and its distinctive slender neck and elegant posture. This pack also introduces the American standard donkey, Hill Radnor sheep, and the Tamworth pig. Craft homely habitats that let your guests get up close with the animals and perhaps even interact with them if they are in the mood for affection!

name: Osterity
description:
Burdensome regulations have long stymied the United Aerospace Corporation's ability to innovate in the energy sector. However, recent pro-business rulings represent a welcome change of pace, clearing the way for us to open an exciting new facility in the Lone Star State. Come on down 'n' see us sometime, y'all!

OSTERITY is a 7+1 map vanilla "mega episode" for the Doom 2 IWAD, powered by OTEX. A 3-episode, Doom 1-inspired megawad squeezed into just 7 maps. The basic formula is to alternate sprawling megamaps with short boss/challenge maps, though the rules are bent a little towards the end.

name: E4M1 remake
description: It's a short map (5-10 minutes) inspired by E4M1. The visuals are kept minimal to stay true to the spirit of the original map.

name: Jurassic World Evolution 2: Park Managers' Collection Pack
description: Discover a range of iconic species with the Jurassic World Evolution 2: Park Managers' Collection Pack. From legendary giants of the oceans and skies, to the most diminutive of prehistoric creatures to walk the earth!

name: 17 Bucks: Floor 1
description: 17 Bucks is a Friday Night Funkin' mod centering around internet personas and original characters.

name: Memoirs of an Angel
description: A fantasy-themed otome visual novel with stat-building and mini-games.

name: Restless Dreams
description:
Restless Dreams (alt. name: Project Gray) is an indie J-RPG x Lovecraftian x Survival horror game currently in development.

It is set six years after the event of Nightmare of the Snow.

name: My Buddy Did Something Weird And Now I Have Feelings For Him??!?!?
description:
Can one little thing change the way you feel about someone?

Everything points to 'yes' when Vale and Lawrence's Quality Bro Time becomes a little too cozy…And gay panic ensues.

name: Furitsu Metatopology Daigaku Fuzoku Joshi Koukou
description:
Fumejo is a doujin SRPG where the protagonist belongs to a club at the prestigious prefectural metapology educational institutionwith a 1200-year tradition. Together with allies, they navigate chaotic battlefields involving firearms, swordsmanship, and magic, aiming to rebuild their club crushed by conspiracy. Known for its setting where girls engage in deadly battles, high playability, and well-crafted background music.

Characters gain experience points through combat to acquire new skills. The game employs a multi-scenario system where outcomes vary based on strategic decisions and choices made during battles. Although criticized for modest production values, an abrupt mid-story ending, and a simplistic growth system resembling a prototype version, it featured diverse elements typical of doujinshi, such as variations in character dialogue and designs, and occasional single-image cut-ins. Notably, the game manual was integrated within the game rather than being a separate paper format. A commercialized version released as "Metajo" was released a year later with many mechanic and graphic improvements as well as story alterations such as allowing players to experience the 1200-year establishment until the end.

name: Reines Du Sabbat
description:
Reines Du Sabbat is a JRPG developed by doujin circle Kenix who would later develop Corpse Party, this work became quite infamous on the Japanese internet during the late 90's and early 2000's due to its grotesque content to the point of being "quietly" distributed on freeware sites.

The game takes place in the country of Serfina. In a small hut there lived a girl called Puff, together with her older brother, Lux. Since they've lost their parents at an early age, the older brother had to take the parent role and take care of his little sister. However, one day, Lux suddenly fell ill with a fever of an unknown origin, with no doctor able to help and him gradually losing his strength. Puff heard about a medicinal herb called the Snow Herb that can quickly bring down any kind of fever and went to the forest of Pia to find it. In the forest, being absorbed in the beautiful flowers blooming there Puff lost her uncle.

This is where the game begins and Puff's journey will lead her to witness the cruelty of human beings...

name: Blitz
description: Blitz is a speedrun type of game that you can run around in and see if you can get the best time. Levels range from the tutorial level, to a level that is just called "Hell". This game can get you glued to your screen for hours.

name: Cinematic Mod
description:
What is Cinematic Mod?

Cinematic Mod (CM) is a Half-Life 2 modification, that adds more details and a darker look to the original Half-Life 2 series.

Imagine, a Hollywood producer got his hands on the game. The result would be similar to what the Cinematic Mod is: a graphics blockbuster, redesigned to the typical game to movie adaption with an orchestral soundtrack and beautiful people everywhere.

Duke must somehow escape from the asylum, locate the nearby
invisible building, and get the alien infestation out of the research center for good!

At the heart of the game is a mystical cube, with each face representing one of the four fundamental elements: fire, water, earth, and air.

In Puzzle Dungeon!!: Earthmage Erin, play as Erin, an Earthmage with the power to control gravity. Solve 30+ puzzles in themed dungeons to rescue Erin's lost goats and bring them back to her farm.

The level begins with Duke cruising on into town on his bike, crashing through gates and ploughing through bad guys all in nicely explosive fashion. Almost every street building you see in the beginning is susceptible to being blown up. Even your all your weapons now have explosive properties.

name: Popcorn Fever
description:
Popcorn Fever is a “suika game” featuring popcorns, developed by Yunicorn Studio !

Need a coffee break, stuck in a long commute, or just want to pass the time? Start a game and merge as many popcorns as you can!

Aim, drop, and merge the popcorns to score points. Customize your game by unlocking unique and surprising powers. Find your own style and climb the leaderboard !

Will you reach the top of the best player pantheon?!

name: Nordhold
description:
Build a city and defend it in this Tower Defense game blending Roguelite mechanics with turn-based building Strategy. Choose your hero, utilize synergistic tower upgrades, and face epic battles in procedurally generated landscapes.

Nordhold is a tower defense game for strategy enthusiasts who crave high replayability through endless combinations. Build and manage a cozy medieval Nordic village while enjoying deep tactical gameplay that doesn’t require extensive learning.

name: Bou's Revenge

name: Stargate SG-1: Unleashed - Episode 2
description:
The second instalment of an episodic mobile game series based on the Stargate franchise, released on iOS devices. The game featured an all-new storyline featuring the original cast and characters of the Stargate SG-1 television series, written by Stargate novelist Sally Malcolm.

The series was originally intended to comprise three episodes, but the third game was never released. The game was eventually delisted from the Apple App Store.

name: Downshot
description: Fully physics based multiplayer. Mod Support, Spawnable weapons, blades, tools, props, enemies, and more. Highly optimized for incredible multiplayer sandbox performance. Explore vast and breathtaking levels. Chat with friends over built in voice chat. Versatile weapons with many uses. Experimental gravity and scaling physics!

name: Galaxians
description:
Galaxians is a clone of Galaxian. The player's goal is to destroy a matrix of enemy spaceships which is gradually descending on the screen. Single ships will sometimes leave the formation and bombard the player with multiple shots.

There's only a single scenario with a single type of spaceship. The process repeats itself when a squadron is completely eliminated, but the difficulty increases.

name: Galaxians: Remastered Edition
description:
Originally launched in 1983 by Artic Computing, the fondly-remembered Galaxians pushed the boundaries of graphics and gameplay, showing gamers what the new breed of home microcomputers were capable of. A fast-paced, all-out action shoot ’em up, this retro classic is still gaining new fans four decades after its initial release.
This lovingly remastered version published by Pixel Games is highly faithful to the original, offering retro fans and casual gamers alike a chance to experience the same thrill as the first generation of players had back in the day. The game can be controlled via the on-screen touch zones that replicate the original keys, or by hooking up a compatible controller to your Android device.

name: Hunt Cook: Catch and Serve
description:
Rabbits, Ravens and Boars?!
Who knew they could all make such tasty meals?!

Wow your customers with rare dishes
and build your own trendy eatery!

Hunt your own ingredients and use them for
a creative menu to make Café HuntCook flourish!

Interplay is proud to present Klondike Solitaire for Android!

- Test your skills with Traditional and Challenge based scoring
- Beat the clock with Timed Play!
- Play Solitaire as you've always known it or switch to Vegas rules for a new challenge!
- See how your game has improved with user statistics
- An easy to use interface

description: The sequel to West Alien Train.

name: West Alien Train
description: Duke must find an alien semi-organic train that is heading west and wipe all those aliens before they trash the next city

name: Alien Sanctuary
description: An alien base on a distant planet.

name: Munchman: 35th Anniversary Edition
description:
Four cunning Hoonos are in hot pursuit of your Munch Man while he races to an energizer to change the attack! Can he make it to safety or does his fate lie in the mouth of the Hoonos?

Replay one of the most famous and fun game created in the 80’s for the Texas Instruments TI-99/4A home computer!
The TI-99 Italian User Group () is proud to present the Android version of the game, totally recreated from scratch, to celebrate the 35th anniversary of the game and on the occasion of the 32th TI-TREFF 2017 at Rome.

name: Unreal Match 3
description: Unreal Match 3 is a match 3 game that's built from the ground up to help developers learn how to make mobile games using Unreal Engine 4.

name: The Sub Shop

name: Seaquest
description: This time Duke is sent to some sort of a submarine base. The alien vermin has taken over a fortress by the sub base and it's your job to cleanse 'em out.

name: Yakzee!
description:
Yakzee! is a dice game for one to four players.

Players take turns rolling five dice, and the player can reroll any or all of the dice twice more before selecting their scoring category. Scoring categories include the sum of all ones to sixes, 3 of a kind, 4 of a kind, full house, a 4 dice straight, a 5 dice straight, yakzee (5 of a kind) and chance (which is the sum of all dice). A game is finished when all 11 scoring categories have been used. Game commands are via moving a cursor. Dice are graphically displayed on the right of the screen.

name: Turok
description: A jungle style map with overgrown temple like structures and a smattering of high-tech and alien hive locations.

name: Yakzee: Remastered Edition
description:
The object of Yakzee is to score the highest number of points you can, or (in multiplayer mode) to score more points than your opponent. Points are awarded by achieving certain combinations of dice (of which there are five in play) with players aiming to score twelve different combinations – we’ll refer to these as ‘tricks’.
After choosing the number of players and the number of rounds you want for your game, the first player starts by rolling five dice – simply tap the “roll dice” button.
Above the dice you will see the twelve different tricks you will be trying to achieve. These are separated into two columns, each featuring six tricks.

name: Famidash
description:
Famidash is a rhythm-based, action platformer that will test every limit of your patience. There are no checkpoints – every time you die, you must try the level over from the start!

Don’t worry though! – There is a practice mode! Simply pause the game, hit B and you’ll set a checkpoint to restart at so you can master any parts of a level.

Avoid distractions as the game switches your playmode from a jumping cube to a flying ship to a hopping UFO to a rolling ball and more!

name: The Based Turnabout
description: Phoenix Wright faces his final case of his career before retirement, but a case involving the king of turnabouts is never so simple, is it?

name: Shadow Dancer
description:
Shadow Dancer on the Master System retains a lot of the arcade game's content, but simplifies the graphics and sound to better suit the hardware. Stage layouts are slightly different, and the decision to use sprites similar in size to the arcade version means that fewer enemies can appear on screen at any one time. Sprite flicker is a common sight, and entire sections of stages are removed to save space. Unlike the arcade version, players cannot backtrack during either side-scrolling or boss sections, limiting player to a very small section of the screen during the boss fights.

The most striking omission in the Master System version of Shadow Dancer is the dog as an active character, but it is still available as a game mechanic. When a valid target is onscreen, the player must crouch. While crouched, the ninja magic icon will slowly transform into a a dog head. When the icon is completely full, it will move to the target enemy's location. Pressing attack will cause the dog to appear out of nowhere and attack the enemy. If no valid target exists, the icon will not move and pressing attack while crouched will perform a normal attack. The dog can be called only three times each stage.

The Master System version retains the first-person shuriken-throwing bonus rounds, but the one between the second and third stage is the same bonus round used by the Mega Drive version, which makes player to jump from a tall building and attack ninjas in a downward shoot-'em-up fashion.

Like the Master System version of Shinobi, ninja magic cannot be used during boss fights. In addition to the previously mentioned problem of being confined to a small section of the screen, this makes the boss fights even more difficult than the arcade version.

A small oddity, in the Master System version, Shinobi always bows to the boss before the battle.

name: The Experimental Turnabout
description: Phoenix, Maya, and Edgeworth awake in a courtroom that seems normal at first, but is in fact one located within a virtual reality created by an individual known only as the Game Master, who insists that this will be a 'history-making experiment'. Now the trio must play along with his scheme and complete the trial he has laid out while working together to figure out who the Game Master is, why he's conducting this experiment, and just how they wound up in this situation at all.

name: May Your Memory Be a Blessing
description:
In the Armenian Orthodox church, it's said that a person's soul wanders the earth for 40 days after they die.
This story is in memory of our father, who passed away 39 days ago.

name: A Little Piece of Healing
description: A mini-case by risefromtheashes. Inspired in part by Apples and Oranges and Gloria in Somnium.

name: Apples and Oranges
description: Late in the day, an older lady approaches one of her local prosecutors to enquire about a case of discrimination. Meanwhile, someone is remembering an absurd event from their early days in an office.

name: Alter A.I.L.A. Genesis
description:
Alter A.I.L.A. Genesis takes place in a post-apocalyptic world. You play the role of a young man known as Leon, who seeks to survive in the harsh environment he is brought into.

Exploration is done mainly via a side-scrolling view. In certain areas, an exclamation mark will sometimes appear, indicating the presence of hostiles. Press Z when this happens to initiate battle, or wait to let it pass. Sometimes battle will be unavoidable. When walking, enemy encounters won't occur.

The battle system revolves mainly around each character's Abilities, which are a set of commands specific to that character. Abilities require AP and EX to use. AP is gained every time a character takes a turn.

name: Gloria in Somnium
description: It's time to wake up...

name: Athena Cykes: Ace Attorney - Dark Ace Saga
description: Vera Misham's trial ended with a hung jury, leading to her death and the failure of the Jurist System.

name: Turnabout Heartache
description:
Valentine's Day! It's a day of love, happiness, and... murder?

Phoenix must defend a client who insists that she is the Cupid of legend while fighting against a prosecutor who heavily believes in the supernatural. Will Phoenix be able to successfully defend a literal goddess in court and save the day? Will he fail, leading to a world without the spread of love? Is all this talk about goddesses and Cupid even legitimate?

name: Waco Resurrection
description: Revisiting the 1993 Waco, Texas incident, gamers enter the mind and form of a resurrected David Koresh and advance towards salvation or destruction by wielding weapons, collecting followers and voicing messianic messages.

name: Planisphere
description: You're traveling home by train, but suddenly there's a crash and the train stops. You look through the window and see ugly monsters everywhere.

name: Trailmakers Hat Pack
description:
Have you ever thought to yourself: “This awesome Viking ship that I just built in Trailmakers is missing something… like a Viking?” If so, you're in luck! With the Hat Pack, YOU can be that Viking.

The Hat Pack contains 13 pieces of headwear for the characters in Trailmakers. If you purchase this pack, you will have all headwear options available in the game.

description: Sin descripción

description: Expand your space-experience with the Space Voyager Pack containing one functional block and a bunch of Sci-Fi looking cosmetic items for that genuine outer-space feel.

name: Train Sim World 4: LIRR Commuter - New York: Long Beach, Hempstead & Hicksville
description: Time to truly experience America's busiest commuter railroad in Train Sim World 4! Return to Long Island and delve deep into an enhanced New York - Hicksville, now including the Long Beach branch, new lighting and skies, overhauled signalling, an all-new bustling timetable, and the LIRR M9!

name: Unravel Trigger
description:
The Frost Neutral Territory - a buffer zone between the superpowers of the Karg Federation and the Vilcar Empire. A tourist hotspot, yet a melting pot of constant conflict with its diverse immigrant populations.

Sakaki Kai, the protagonist, is an investigator at the Trigger Detective Agency based on this neutral ground. His mission? To track down his childhood friend Yuzuriha Saina, who vanished during the last great war.

While there have been scattered sightings of Saina in this area, her trail has gone cold.

Then, from a hilltop overlooking the city, Kai crosses paths with Millie - a young girl reaching up towards the sky. Much like Saina from years past, Millie laments the endless cycle of violence and yearns for peace. This meeting isn't just a big deal for Kai or the neutral district—it will shake things up for the whole world.

A tale of confronting lost pasts to stride towards a new future - the curtain rises here.

The map includes some features taken from Minecraft, like crafting or using of torches to light the areas.

description: As its name already suggests, the Car & Bobblehead Pack contains two cool new additions for your Construction Simulator game: Buckle up and unleash the power of the DLC’s exclusive sports car painted in a vibrant shade of orange that'll leave a trail of pixelated dust in your wake as you drive across the two huge maps. Plus, this add-on provides you with a co-pilot in the form of a bobblehead of your good friend Hape, which is automatically placed on the virtual dashboard of select vehicles.

name: Starslave
description: An Egyptian ruin with a dark secret. Contains a story, lots of quad runs, randomized elements, and plenty of secrets. Runs on the Copper mod, which is included.

name: Construction Simulator: Customization Kit
description: The construction site is your runway, so pimp your helmets and bring some color to your construction work! The Customization Kit contains additional styles for your personal protection equipment. Customize your helmets with 9 different fun and colorful designs, ranging from fiery flames to classy dots, and choose from a selection of ear protection and glasses.

name: Torture Jam 1
description: The God of flesh and desire has such sights to show you. But in order to be granted that privilege, he demands tribute in form of good suffering. He has graciously given Map-Center's community time to create a Strogg inspired torture maps worthy of his magnificence. Featuring seven new maps, a hub level, final boss and several intermissions.

name: Boss Speedjam 1
description: A short expansion, featuring a hub level and several new maps where each boss encounter is more than just shooting a bullet sponge.

name: 12 Locks: Plasticine Room
description: 12 Locks: Plasticine Room is an online puzzle game that challenges players to use their puzzle-solving skills to unlock 12 different locks to complete the game. The game is set in a plasticine room, where players must navigate their way through the challenges to unlock each lock. The puzzles require players to think creatively and logically, using their problem-solving skills to overcome each obstacle in their path. With each lock unlocked, players gain a sense of satisfaction and progress toward completing the game.

name: Blake Turner: Ace Attorney
description: A little girl is found dead at the foot of a cliff, but her body suffered such injuries that it is not identified. A clumsy witness, a shabby prosecutor and a sharp attorney may lead to a "Not Guilty". Then who did really kill her?

name: The Corrupted Turnabout
description: Taking place a few months after Turnabout Time Traveller, Apollo Justice returns from Khura'in to America on what is supposed to be a simple vacation. Unfortunately for him, he is roped yet again into yet another murder case. With a high profile client, a familiar prosecutor and a locked room mystery, will he able to solve the case and glean the truth?

name: Toree's Panic Pack
description: Toree's Panic Pack is a collection of three tiny 3D Platformer games in a classic low poly aesthetic: Toree Genesis, Toree Jumbled Jam 2, and Toree Missions.

name: Turnabout Revolution
description:
Four months after the events of Turnabout Substitution, Apollo finds himself defending an enigmatic shop owner accused of arson.

Meanwhile, Justice, a terrorist organization seeking to change a corrupt judicial system through violent means, has claimed its twelvth victim.

Desperate for clues, the police are left with no choice but to release a convicted murderer Apollo knows only too well from prison, hoping he will give them the information they need on Justice.

Planned to be 4 phases, but only 1-3 was completed

When those two stories intersect, the case soon takes a turn for the tragic, uncovering dark secrets from the past and leaving a permanent mark in the history of the courts.

The time for Revolution has come.

name: The Spirit's Turnabout
description: Be welcome to The Spirit's Turnabout.

name: Ace Attorney: Athena Cykes - Wisdom at Law
description: Athena has a new apprentice, top of his class super prodigy Blaze Mavrik (his sprites are so cool guys), and together they unravel a HUGE mystery and defeat a insane serial killer called 'THE HAND OF DEATH' who threatens to destroy law and order and everyone's lifes in Japanafornia!!!

name: Ben Tennyson: Ace Attorney
description:
Have you ever wondered what would happen in a world where Phoenix Wright never lost his badge? And yet, he still lost Zak Gramarye's case? A major difference would be that he never would've gotten involved with Kristoph Gavin, which in turn means he would never meet Apollo Justice.

But... Then what?
This series will explore that very possibility

name: Neverness to Everness
description: Supernatural urban open-world RPG

name: Superboss of the Turnabout
description: Welcome to Superboss of the Turnabout. Here our trio of lawyers will face one of their strongest opponents yet... a gamer, the true and only boss in the courtroom. After a murder in the gaming convention and agreeing to help another gamer, our characters have gone through many tribulations for several days... but that's not really what matters honestly. What matters is that you get gamer-brained, and prepare for one big battle. The game's on.

name: QotU
description: Two friends stand alone in an abandoned courthouse, wondering where everything went wrong. And yet they know that there's only one path forward for them after everything that's happened. This is the story of Chihiro Ayasato, a former surgeon who disappeared from public life one day and re-emerged as the most trusted confidant of Urami Shikabane, head of Osaka's most prominent yakuza family.

name: Spiteful Lovers in a Perfect World
description: How would you live in a world without suffering?

name: Sidelined Futures
description: In an alternate Takumi-Verse, Miles Edgeworth's cushy, straight-A student life at Ivy U. is interrupted when a murder happens on campus. He takes it upon himself to investigate, battling his own demons as he comes face-to-face with the consequences of the law.

name: A Turnabout On Rails
description: Welcome to A Turnabout On Rails! Fasten your seatbelts as this train will follow the track to its destination no matter the cost. Even if that destination happens to be murder...

name: The Turned About Turnabout
description:
Phoenix and Maya are thrown into yet another murder case with little to no idea of what they're doing. Same old, same old, huh? Except, this prosecutor... well, let's just say he's a bit "special." With such a clueless opponent, this should be an easy ride for our humble protagonists.

...Right?

name: Ace Attorney: Beyond the Shadows
description: Ace Attorney: Beyond the Shadows is a collection of cases set after the events of Dual Destinies and the whole dark age of the law plotline, hence the title.

name: A Game of Turnabouts
description: This case is set in canon, taking place after the events of Spirit of Justice.

name: The Other Side
description: This is a very short story, set outside Ace Attorney canon. The game follows Morty Cisco, an entirely unremarkable young man who meets with an unfortunate accident. Now he struggles with an incident from his past that he would prefer to forget. This is a new style for me, so let me know what you think.

name: The Dividing Line
description: A short game set outside Ace Attorney canon, this game has multiple endings with branching paths with even 'incorrect' choices leading to something new.

name: The Angry Turnabout
description: Sin descripción

name: So Many Words
description: Find the hidden word, each word guess is met with feedback indicating the correctly positioned letters. This is a word game that requires mastery of the English language, logic and a bit of luck. Choose to test your skills with words ranging from 4 to 9 letters in length.

name: ShedHorror
description:
You've cornered yourself in a tiny shed in an attempt to hide from the creature that has been hunting you down. Now your best chance at survival is to keep the creature at bay from within the shed until dawn. However, all you have to work with is a flashlight and your ears.

This game contains an abundance of RED. If you're suffering from erythrophobia, you'll have a stroke playing this game.

name: A Lucky First Turnabout: A Klavier Gavin Story
description: In an alternate universe where Klavier Gavin is the rookie defense attorney and Apollo Justice is the genius prosecutor...

name: Simon Scoop: Ace Attorney
description: A rookie defense attorney/journalist Simon Scoop has to defend his best friend (who's also a journalist) for the murder of their boss, Jorge York. He has to cross-examine the crazy janitor of the companyr and take down the real criminal. Will he be able to protect his best friend? Play to find out!

name: Hexual Deflection
description: Hexual Deflection is a minimalistic Multiplayer Arena RTS with Tower Defense Mechanics where you do not only defend against enemy units with towers but also send your own units onto enemy towers. Your goal is to be last player alive on the board. Fast paced and chaotic gameplay may require you to quickly adapt to changes on the playfield

name: Dragon Ball Z: The Legacy Of Tenkaichi
description: Dragon Ball Z: The Legacy Of Tenkaichi (DBZ: TLOT) is a mod that uses the videogame Dragon Ball Z Budokai Tenkaichi 3 as it's base, created by the youtuber TioMedusin. It includes new characters, transformations, skins, techniques, and stages that can be classic, from Dragon Ball, Z and GT, or new, from Super. New latin spanish voicelines and texts, menus, descriptions for characters, subtitles, and renders are also included here as some extra details. There's also new missions for Ultimate Battle mode. The most notable change it's that now there are more detailed and epic damaged skins, when you recover from an strong attack you will have your clothes very destroyed with almost all characters.

name: Red Door Ylw Door
description: Red Door Yellow Door is a first-person psychological horror game. Starting with what seems like a normal ritual but quickly revealing its sinister nature. Beware, something malevolent lurks in the shadows.

name: Genghis Khan
description: Sin descripción

name: Pixelite

name: Teenage Lawnmower
description:
You're seventeen and your life is a living hell. Between your alcoholic mother and her abusive boyfriend you've got nowhere to go until one day the glistening metal exterior of the family lawn mower catches your eye and changes your destiny forever.

Become an entrepreneur and change your fate in this humorous, story-based 3D simulation by Seth A. Robinson. Can you make money mowing lawns while helping your mom kick her alcohol (and possible drug) abuse? A twisted mix of simulation, interactive story, and arcade action.

name: NPC Adventure: Post-Jam Edition
description: Play as Greg the shopkeeper in his journey to take down the king and be part of the knight's story with upgraded battle mechanics, foes to fight, and friends to talk to.

name: The Dinner Heist

The Dinner Heist is a hard platformer game where you play as a rat who has gotten down on hard times. It is your job to help him steal a meal from this prestige factory that creates food.

Developed By TapeTracker

name: Dishonored 2: Steelbook Edition
description: Dishonored 2 is a first-person action video game and the sequel to Dishonored. It borrows many of the gameplay elements from the first opus: players define their own play style by blending action, assassination, stealth, mobility and combat. Combining tools at their disposal, players are allowed options to eliminate enemies, whether they choose to pursue them unseen or ruthlessly attack head on. Dishonored 2 features the same campaign style as its predecessor in which the protagonist must advance through a series of missions.

name: Sokoban World

name: Atomix
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragon's Dogma II: Dragon's Dogma Music & Sound Collection - Custom Sounds

This bundle features the games of the Aery - Calm Mind series. These ganes are an interactive game experiences that are designed to relax your mind and soul while following an exciting story.
You jump into the role of a little bird, explore beautiful landscapes and collect magical crystals that mark certain landscapes.
Because there are no enemies or any other danger in this game you will be able to lean back and enjoy the scenery and the sensation of flying. It is a great game for relaxing and calming down after an exhausting day full of hassle.
Of course, you can always select the level that you feel helps most to relax yourself. Most levels can be finished quite quickly so that you can freely choose spend time exploring the environment but you don't have to stay for too long if you are just looking for a short moment of peace and enjoyment.
This game features a collection of some the most beautiful sceneries from the Aery franchise.

name: Infamous: Second Son - Paper Trail
description:
Paper Trail is a site that is centered around Infamous: Second Son. Its purpose is to have a series of mini-games released on a weekly basis which eventually leads to free DLC for people who participate in the events.

As of December 16, 2018, the website is no longer active, but the in-game missions are still playable.

Paper Trail began a week before the release of Second Son and launched a series of quizzes that would, by the time Second Son came out, be used to start a small series of events inside the game.

By completing each "episode" the player would gain Karmic points which track the player's progress throughout the event game.

name: Bunker Wars

Bunker Wars: WW1 Strategy is a real-time strategy war game with multiplayer! Gather an army, participate in epic PVP battles, devise your own tactics for victory, and become the best in tower defense!

In the midst of a world war, defend your base from enemies and break through their defenses. Upgrade your bunkers and expand your territories by sending an army to capture strangers. Install towers and distribute troops to different targets.
Strategize in every battle, bypass trenches, upgrade your base, and capture all enemy structures to win this epic RTS game!

name: Sonic [Unl]
description:
In 2010 an unknown rom was posted on the romhacking community of Sonic the Hedgehog. The rom in question was found near an abandoned nursery under broken condition. The rom was eventually dumped for all to play.

This rom became infamous for not having the greatest controls, and it appeared to be very glitchy. Some the glitches were that collision was off, and enemies spawned less frequently, it was removed on October 30th of 2010.

One user managed to grab it in time, and played the hack for themselves, and it wasn't just glitches that they saw.

name: LittleBigPlanet 2: Move Pack
description:
The LittleBigPlanet 2 Move Pack combines the PlayStation Move controller with the world of LittleBigPlanet, and with five giant story levels and seven side levels, this is LittleBigPlanet’s biggest Downloadable Content (DLC) pack to date!

The LittleBigPlanet2: Move Pack features a new story mode – The Rise of the Cakeling – in which a rogue cake threatens doom and destruction, and you Sackfolk must once again attempt to restore peace to Craftworld. This time though you’ll have a brand new toy to make things easier, The Brain Crane; a new powerup that allows you to control objects with the power of your mind, freaky!

A new suite of new creative tools give you the power to create your own Move games, record fluid motions, and paint your own stickers, whilst a boatload of new stickers, materials, decorations, costumes, music, sound and sequencer objects will vastly broaden your creative palette, and make your Popit heave at the seams.

It is none other than Little Big Planet’s very own Sackboy! But beware; the mysterious Phantom has plans to get in the way. With the help of new inventions – Attract-O-Gel and Attract-O-Tweak – it’ll be up to you to help the Muppet cast put on the show of a lifetime. On with the show!

name: Overdrive
description:
Overdrive – Ninja Shadow Revenge is a action platformer in the shadow theme with a futuristic story-line.

More than 4 million players around the world have been enjoying the sci-fi design, let’s join them!

In the future, a strong, outstanding species is created from the combination of humans, technology and black metal. The government names them “shadow cyborg” and allows every sector to have their own shadow security force (S.E.F), all of which have to be controlled by the Headquarter based in Century city.

Everything seems so perfect, ‘til the day Headquarter is under attacked by a Dark Clan.. Hacked, the Lord Commander of S.E.F slays his soldier and replace them by new shadow cyborg generation to take over the government. CORE, a senior cyborg soldier discovers the plot too late. After the attack, CORE joins the rebel and heads to the city seeking revenge for his comrades and destroying the Dark Clan.

Starting from the Dark Forest, you will face dangerous enemies and traps. In the fight, use your skill to avoid attack and make extraordinary combos.
